job_tasks.phrase: De vrijheid om zelf je eigen projecten te realiseren en in te richten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the freedom to realize and set up one's own projects, which aligns with the core software development task of building and managing projects.

job_tasks.phrase: Meer dan alleen een 'developer' zijn. Jij bent de technische schakel.
job_tasks.justification: This suggests a role that goes beyond just coding, acting as a technical link or interface, which is a common aspect of software development and integration roles.

job_tasks.phrase: Je helpt mee om het bedrijf vorm te geven.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates involvement in shaping the company, which relates to understanding the business context and contributing to its strategic direction.

job_tasks.phrase: We werken veel met AI en de nieuwste LLM modellen.
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions working with AI and LLM models, which falls under the specialization of AI/ML tasks, specifically model development or application.

soft_skills.phrase: De vrijheid om zelf je eigen projecten te realiseren en in te richten.
soft_skills.justification: The freedom to realize and set up one's own projects implies a degree of ownership and initiative.
Being a 'technical link' implies a communication and collaboration role, bridging technical aspects.

soft_skills.phrase: Je helpt mee om het bedrijf vorm te geven.
soft_skills.justification: Helping to shape the company suggests a strategic and business-oriented contribution.
Growth ambition implies a willingness to learn and adapt as the company grows.

profile.rationale: The job ad emphasizes software development tasks ('realiseren en inrichten van projecten', 'developer', 'technische schakel') which fall under Macro-Category A. It also mentions working with AI and LLM models (Macro-Category B), but the core focus appears to be on integrating or utilizing these technologies within a software development context rather than deep model development or specialization. The role is described as a 'technical link' and contributing to 'shaping the company', suggesting the AI/LLM aspect is a feature integrated into the software engineering role.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very brief and lacks specific details about the nature of the AI/LLM work. While it mentions Python and LLM models, the core responsibilities are described in general software engineering terms. This makes it difficult to definitively classify the depth of AI involvement. The profile assignment is based on the emphasis on software development and the general mention of AI/LLM.
